---Astroblast/Switchblade/Dead-End/Drag Strip/Rippersnapper---

Astroblast transforms (if he hadn't already) and enters a CR 
chamber. His battle wounds weren't that bad, and he would be out 
soon. He sets up the CR, and starts the process.

Rippersnapper arrives back at base after a disapointing end to his 
fight with Orion, and he isn't too happy, not that he is every really 
happy though. "Rippersnapper want to crush slag out of bots." He 
leaps at Sinnertwin from behind.

Switchblade smiles. A new warrior to match the previous creation. 
"As I recall, there were two bots in the base who don't belong. 
Firestrike, find them," he says coldly, "and terminate them." he 
finishes with a glint in his glowing green eyes. "I expect NO 
failures." Switchblade exits the lab, and heads up to control room.

Dead-End and Drag Strip arrive at the base. They land, and enter 
the base only to find that only one of the ship's CR chambers ins't 
in use. Drag Strip pushes Dead-End out of the way, and walks 
inside, starting the process. Dead-End grumbles, "...crazy loser, I'll 
get the CR eventually, it really doesn't matter when I get it as long 
as I do." He checks out his charred right side, and winces in pain 
as he touches one deep gash, probably from the shrapnel of a 
missile.
